data.text: @Kit_Yates_Maths @chrischirp Journalists have also gone silent on it in the UK because the tories control the media and the tories have decided covid is over and  ot worth thinking about anymore.

@Kit_Yates_Maths The GBD's a very cold-blooded group.

Not a lot of humanity showing. https://t.co/VDo1ygHZAb

@Kit_Yates_Maths False. Wars go on all the time.
Whats new is that this war is against white people, and its not us that started it. That makes it newsworthy.
@Kit_Yates_Maths Gosh, do the GBD adjacent folk now worry, having won, that they'll lose their grift?
@Kit_Yates_Maths If this is the first signatory of GBD, I can just imagine what kind of people can be its supporters... 🤦🏻‍♂️

@Em_Lickspittle @Kit_Yates_Maths The reason I'm not excluding a connection is because of Russia's long standing support of far right movements in Europe. But that of course does not mean they have to be connected, even if their aims and methods are similar. (Not all sentences that rhyme are in the same verse)
@Kit_Yates_Maths Yes, this is particularly unconvincing as, being Swedish, he can't have missed the news that Sweden is sending military aid abroad for the first time since 1939.

@PeterBarabas1 @Kit_Yates_Maths No they are not. Look, it is far right domestic faction that boosted & enabled folk like him, not the Russians. It is certain 'Western' billionaires & political power players that make up that domestic far right faction I am referring to. I don't want Russia to take Ukraine btw.
